title: Ivanti Endpoint Manager MyResolveEventHandler Untrusted Search Path Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of Ivanti Endpoint Manager. Authentication is required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the implementation of the MyResolveEventHandler method. The issue results from loading a library from an untrusted location. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of NETWORK SERVICE.
addtionnal_details: Ivanti has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://forums.ivanti.com/s/article/Security-Advisory-EPM-January-2025-for-EPM-2024-and-EPM-2022-SU6
timeline:
2024-10-08 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2025-01-19 - Coordinated public release of advisory
2025-01-19 - Advisory Updated
